message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_NAME_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: A determination configuration with this Name already exists.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_REFERENCE_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: A determination configuration with this Reference already exists.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date must be later than or equal to the Start Date.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_NAME_TRANSLATION_DUPLICATE
message.locale: A determination configuration name translation for this Language has already been created.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_DEL_HAS_ASSOCIATED_DETERMINATION_PACKAGES
message.locale: This determination configuration has associated determination packages and cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_STARTDATE_AFTER_ASSOCIATED_DETERMINATION_PACKAGES_FROMDATE
message.locale: The Start Date must be earlier or equal to the from date of any associated determination packages %1d.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_ENDDATE_BEFORE_ASSOCIATED_DETERMINATION_PACKAGES_TODATE
message.locale: The End Date of the determination configuration must be later than the to date of the associated determination package, %1d.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_ENDDATE_BEFORE_ASSOCIATED_DETERMINATION_PACKAGES_FROMDATE
message.locale: The End Date of the determination configuration must be later than the from date of the associated determination package, %1d.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_MOD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This determination configuration may not be modified as it has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_DEL_HAS_ASSOCIATED_CONDITIONS
message.locale: This determination configuration has associated conditions and cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_DEL_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This determination configuration has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_AUTOMATICCONSOLIDATION_TRUE_AND_MULTIPLESOURCES_TRUE
message.locale: Automatic Consolidation cannot be set if Multiple sources is not set to true.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_ASSIGN_AC_STANDALONEDC_ONE_AC
message.locale: This determination configuration %1d already has an association to another assessment configuration. This determination configuration is standalone and can only have one association to an assessment configuration.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_ASSIGN_AC_STANDALONEDC_NO_DC_TO_AC
message.locale: The assessment configuration has other active determination configuration associations. Following standalone determination configurations cannot be assigned to this assessment:%1s

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_ASSIGN_ASSESSMENTCONFIG_STANDALONEDC_ONLY
message.locale: Following determination configurations are standalone. They cannot be selected for assignment along with another determination configuration:%1s

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_ASSIGN_ASSESSMENTCONFIG_NO_DC
message.locale: No determination configuration has been selected.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_DELETE_AFTER_ASSIGN_ASSESSMENTCONFIG
message.locale: This determination configuration is associated to an assessment configuration and cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_CREATE_ASSESSMENTCONFIG_INVALID_TYPE
message.locale: The assessment Type must be "Decision Assist".

message.name: ERR_DETERMINATIONCONFIG_MODIFY_ASSESSMENTCONFIG_INVALID_TYPE
message.locale: The assessment Type must be "Decision Assist".
